name: openSUSE Project
description: Makers' choice for sysadmins, developers & users

projects.summary: A project aimed at optimizing the database performance for Uyuni.
Development of a command similar to kubectl for improving management control interface.

projects.project_name: AI-Driven Test Selection on Pull Request acceptance tests
projects.summary: Implementation of AI elements to determine test cases for pull request acceptance.

projects.project_name: Refactoring Hibernate Queries in Uyuni: Towards a Unified Approach
projects.summary: Refactor Hibernate queries in Uyuni to achieve a more unified query approach.
Creating the foundational infrastructure for UI plugins in Uyuni.

projects.project_name: Remove use of Java raw types
projects.summary: A project to eliminate the usage of raw types in Java to enhance code quality.
Development of a logging tool to aid detection and diagnosis for openSUSE and OBS.

projects.project_name: 101.o.o shows 'Please wait for loading the projects ...'
projects.summary: Addressing a bug where the system hangs while loading project data.

projects.project_name: Analytics Edge Ecosystem Workloads: A Framework for Using AI and ML in the Finance Vertical
projects.summary: Framework development to integrate AI and ML practices into financial workloads.

projects.project_name: Extract and containerize Uyuni Salt event processor
projects.summary: Containerization of the Uyuni Salt event processor to enhance deployment.
Providing Packit support for the Open Build Service (OBS) in openSUSE.
Enhancing the test coverage for the rpmlint project to ensure better quality assurance.
